name: Polaris
description: Polaris is an AMD+NVIDIA GPU-based system with 560 nodes and 4 A100 GPUs per node.

name: Sophia
description: Sophia is an AMD+NVIDIA GPU-based system with 24 nodes and 8 A100 GPUs per node.

name: Crux
description: Crux is an AMD CPU-only system with 256 nodes.

name: Aurora
description: Aurora is an HPE Cray-Ex based system with 10,624 nodes and 6 Intel Data Center GPU Max Series per node.
